Djo Tunda Wa Munga (amụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Congo. Maka ihe nkiri egwu ya nke afọ 2010 Viva Riva!, o meriri ihe nrite maka onye nduzi kacha mma na African Movie Academy Awards na 2011. Viva Riva! merikwara na 2011 MTV Movie Awards maka Best African Movie Awards
E wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na mba iri na asatọ nke Afrịka ma gosipụta echiche siri ike nke ndụ na Kinshasa

Ọ bụ ihe nkiri Congo nke mbụ e mepụtara kemgbe Mobutu Sese Seko mechiri ụlọ ọrụ ahụ afọ iri abụọ na ise gara aga. Riva, onye na-ere mmanụ ụgbọala na-ere ahịa, hụrụ enyi nwanyị nke onye isi mpụ nke Kinshasa n'anya. Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Angole Hoji Fortuna nwetakwara ihe nkiri nkwado kachasị mma na MTV Movie Awards maka ngosipụta ya nke onye na-eme egwuregwu aha ya bụ Cesar.
Àtụ:Africa Movie Academy Award for Best Director
